title: Derived rules of inference
content: In this section, we prove a few rules of inference derived from modus ponens ~ ax-mp , and which do not depend on any other axioms.

blocks.name: bj-mp2c
blocks.content: A double modus ponens inference. Inference associated with ~ mpd . (Contributed by BJ, 24-Sep-2019.)

blocks.name: bj-mp2d
blocks.content: A double modus ponens inference. Inference associated with ~ mpcom . (Contributed by BJ, 24-Sep-2019.)
